alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:23PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Webb County through 300 PM CST... At 223 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Las Tiendas, or 24 miles southwest of Encinal, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Las Tiendas and Ranchos Penitas West. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 680 and 682. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
